beer.beer_description:
We hear you.

Our microdosed IPA series was one of the most successful innovation series. It also happens to be our most requested style to rebrew so after over 12 months we’re back with this little Christmas gift for our advent-ers.

Microdosing a beer also happens to be the most physically intense dry hopping technique we’ve ever dreamt up! Well… at least it was until we thought up triple dry hopping but that doesn’t make the narrative as fun so ignore that!

For this beer we’ve carefully selected 3 hops that we know are going to blow your socks off - Citra, Centennial and Motueka. We then combined them and separated them into seven equal, separated doses which were added to the beer every day for a week after fermentation.

The result is an extra hazy, extra hoppy, dangerously easy-drinking NEIPA that explodes with smooth citrus flavours.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 280 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 57! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 70 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 15!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 165 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 34!

items.checkin_comment: One of their best to date.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 115 check-ins with a photo.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 145 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.checkin_comment:
Catching up on MC Advent.
8.8% NEIPA.
Soft sweet syrupy tropical juice.
4.35⭐️
😋

user.bio: I love craft beer & I enjoy the elusive hunt for the next rare 5☆ gem. Lover of dark monsters, and juicy hop bombs.

items.comment: Better get on it! There's only 321days till Christmas.... again! 😛🎄

user.bio: I fear no beer & am willing to taste anything at least once. Too often I will go back for another tasting.      Join me!
Pretty much a binge-drinking, weekend warrior. My 3 favourite 'M' things: motorcycles, muscle cars, and micro-brews.
Seattle to Vancouver and many places in between.

Martin lake brewery,

Founder / Brewer 

On a mission too make the best beers possible????
